title: Scarf
description: Scarf, Brittany lace, fine machine made net with thread embroidery. Border of flower sprays, field plain except for single line of small flowers down center, and flower medallion at ends. Picot edge. Imitation of Point d\'Alencon. Made in Franciscan convent at Saint Brieux.
creditline: Bequest of John R. Van Derlip in memory of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
